messages.subject: Regarding the Passing of Hakubaikou
messages.msgSnippet: If anyone here was introduced to the Shinsengumi by Rurouni Kenshin and the immense fandom here in the US then you likely visited or even contributed to
messages.messageBody:
If anyone here was introduced to the Shinsengumi by Rurouni Kenshin
and the immense fandom here in the US then you likely visited or even
contributed to Hakubaikou.com.

This message is from her family:
http://hakubaikou.deviantart.com/journal/23241045/

~secretarytocapt3
